branchCategory.name: SJ3A6
branchCategory.description: <p>Series SJ3A6 is a vacuum release valve equipped with a restrictor to enable flow rate adjustment of released air. This space saving series is 10mm wide, designed in a cassette type format and uses a card-edge type connector. The SJ3A6 valves are compatible with Serial Interface units for both CC-Link and DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span> protocols.</p>

branchItem.name: SJ3A6 Series, Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
branchItem.description: <p>SJ3A6 is a vacuum release valve equipped with a restrictor.  Two spool valves are built in.  Vacuum suction and release can be controlled with a single valve.  Each valve is equipped with a restrictor to enabe flow rate adjustment of released air.</p>

branchItem.name: SS3J3-V60, Non Plug-in, Individual Wiring, Manifold for SJ3A6 Series Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
SS3J3-V60FD, Plug-in D-sub Connector, Manifold for SJ3A6 Series Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
SS3J3-V60-PD/PGD/PHD/JD/GD, Plug-in, Flat Ribbon Cable, Manifold for Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
branchItem.description: <p>SJ3A6 manifold with Flat Ribbon and PC Wiring connection.</p>

branchItem.name: SS3J3-V60S, Plug-in Connector, Serial Transmission, Manifold for SJ3A6 Series Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
SS3J3-V60S6B, Plug-in Connector, Serial Transmission, Manifold for SJ3A6 Series Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
branchItem.description: <p>SJ3A6 manifold for EX510 Gateway System Connection.</p>

branchItem.name: SS3J3-V60L, Plug-in, D-sub Connector, Flat Ribbon Cable, Manifold for Series Vacuum Release Valve w/Restrictor
branchItem.description: <p>SJ3A6 Plug-in cable type manifold with D-sub connector and Flat Ribbon cable.</p>
